function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from wild animals to humans","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of diseases among human population","Mitigation":"Enforce strict guidelines on interaction with wild animals, and monitor and quarantine potentially infected individuals","Technologies":"Advanced disease detection and monitoring technologies","People":"Public, wildlife conservation workers, researchers","Owner":"Government, wildlife conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of zoonotic disease transmission through wildlife conservation activities","Impact":"Emergence of new infectious diseases in human populations","Mitigation":"Implement biosecurity measures for wildlife conservation activities, conduct regular health screenings for wildlife workers","Technologies":"Biosecurity infrastructure, rapid disease testing kits","People":"Wildlife conservation workers, researchers, local communities","Owner":"Wildlife conservation organizations, government health agencies"}]}
